channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump veers away from swing states for his Madison Square Garden moment
item.description: Donald Trump is finally getting his Madison Square Garden moment. With just over a week to go before Election Day, the former president will take the stage at one of the country’s most iconic venues, hosting a hometown rally to deliver his campaign’s closing message against Democratic Vice President

item.title: North Dakota voters may end most property taxes. Government programs could face huge cuts
item.description: North Dakota voters this fall could end the property tax by approving a ballot measure that opponents say would drastically slash a variety of state services.

item.title: Missouri sports betting ballot measure highlights national debate about tax rates
item.description: Missouri voters are considering whether to make the state the 40th jurisdiction to legalize sports betting.
